Detailed Description

Provides file I/O operations and manages caching on disk.

Member Function Documentation

bool FileHandler::appendData ( const char *  filename,
const char *  data,
unsigned int  size 
) [static]

Appends data to file.

Parameters:
filename Name of file to append data. NULL to reuse previous file
data Data to write
size Size of data to write. Zero to close the file
Return values:
True Write was successful
False Write failed

bool FileHandler::doesFileExist ( const char *  filename  )  [static]

Checks if 'cacheDirectory/filename' exists.

Parameters:
filename Name of file to check
Return values:
True File exists and can be opened
False File does not exist or cannot be opened

bool FileHandler::init ( char *  cacheDirectoryPath  )  [static]

Sets up the File Handler with a root cache directory.

Parameters:
cacheDirectoryPath Path of the cache directory
Return values:
True Directory is valid and exists
False Directory is invalid or does not exist

ALuint FileHandler::readFileIntoBuffer ( const char *  filename  )  [static]

Reads data from file, creates OpenAL buffer.

Parameters:
filename Name of file to read
Returns:
Handle to OpenAL buffer
Return values:
AL_NONE on failure

const char *  data,
unsigned int  size 
) [static]

Writes or Overwrites data to file.

Parameters:

data Data to write

Return values:
True Write was successful
